createAgent

public boolean createAgent(AgentObject agentObject,
                           AgentSubject agentSubject)
Usage: Comments: The occurrence time is derived from the current simulation step. A AgentSubjectCreationEvent instance is created with the occuranceTime and the agentSubject. The event instance is afterwards added to a ArrayList which is content of a EnvironmentSimulatorJavaEvent instance. This event instance is then notified to all listeners with the help of the fireEvent method.

Specified by:
createAgent in interface EnvironmentAccessFacet
Parameters:
agentObject -
agentSubject -
